summary: An ordinance providing for the cancellation of the assessments on certain property levied for the improvement of 23rd Avenue West, et al., by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 43322, and providing for the appropriation of three hundred ($300.00) dollars from the General Fund, all in full settlement of the property damage claim of John Lundin as set forth in claim filed with the City Comptroller, the same being Comptroller's File No. 86331.
